qas.question: Juvenile and adult  beroe lack what?

context: Development of the fertilized eggs is <b5_0>direct<b5_0/>, in other words there is no distinctive larval form, and juveniles of all groups generally resemble miniature cydippid adults. In the genus <a4_0><a4_1><a4_2>Beroe<a4_2/><a4_1/><a4_0/> the juveniles, like the adults, lack <a0_0><a0_1><a0_2><b6_0>tentacles and tentacle sheaths<b6_0/><a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/>.
